page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: Opposite our School in Burnham Road is a Baptist Chapel.It was built in 1861. There are gravestones in the front.It is now used as a{playschool}for children under 5.St Leonards Church is on the corner.There is a little room at the top of the porch where monks used to run a school.Now they have{ {Fellowship meetings}and{Explorers club in it.The{Scout hut}is on the playing field.They have{Beavers}aged from 6-8 years,{Cubs}8-10\ and{Scouts}from 10\ to 15 using it.Christ Church in North Street has a hall which is used for{ {dancing classes,Sunday School}and{ {Young Farmers.}The Memorial Hall in the High Street is always in use by the{Library, Clinic}and{Womens {Institute.}There is also a Parish Room and a Community Centre.
